decolorization result: visible color change from blue to violet
any additional information: Initial color change observed at 10 µg/ml, but struggled at 30 µg/ml.
Observed on TLC showing various degradation products.
Decolorization was influenced by various carbon and nitrogen sources.
Effective decolorization indicated synergistic enzyme activity.
Additives like glucose greatly aid decolorization.
Combination of mixed cultures showed enhanced degradation.
Inhibition was noted without the addition of supplementary carbon sources.
